newsitem.title: TAIWAN: Taiwan Sept industrial output up 3.9 pct yr/yr.
newsitem.headline: Taiwan Sept industrial output up 3.9 pct yr/yr.

text.p: Taiwan's industrial output in September rose 3.90 percent from September 1995, the economics ministry said on Monday.
In month-on-month terms, September industrial output was down 0.58 percent from August, the ministry said.
The manufacturing index, including metals, machinery, information electronics, chemical and consumer products, rose 3.78 percent in September from September 1995.
Real estate and construction industry output fell 0.59 percent from a year earlier. Mining industry put fell 11.09 percent compared with a year earlier.
